# shoehorn_tenant_settings (Resource)

Manages Shoehorn tenant appearance settings. This is a singleton resource per tenant - create performs an upsert and delete only removes from Terraform state.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Manage tenant appearance settings and announcement bar (singleton per tenant)
resource "shoehorn_tenant_settings" "main" {
  # Platform Branding
  platform_name        = "Acme Developer Portal"
  platform_description = "Internal developer portal for Acme Corp"
  company_name         = "Acme Corporation"

  # Color Palette
  primary_color   = "#3b82f6" # Blue - active states, primary buttons
  secondary_color = "#64748b" # Slate - hover states, secondary UI
  accent_color    = "#8b5cf6" # Purple - highlights, badges

  # Assets
  logo_url     = "https://cdn.example.com/logo.png"
  favicon_url  = "https://cdn.example.com/favicon.ico"
  default_theme = "dark" # Options: light, dark, system

  # Announcement Bar (optional)
  announcement = {
    enabled   = true
    message   = "Scheduled maintenance: Saturday 2AM-4AM UTC"
    type      = "warning" # Options: info, warning, error, success
    pinned    = false     # If true, users cannot dismiss
    link_url  = "https://status.acme.com"
    link_text = "View Status Page"
  }
}

# Minimal configuration (all fields optional)
resource "shoehorn_tenant_settings" "minimal" {
  platform_name = "My Portal"
}

# Configuration without announcement
resource "shoehorn_tenant_settings" "no_announcement" {
  platform_name = "Acme Portal"
  primary_color = "#1E88E5"
  default_theme = "system"
}
```

## Schema

### Optional

- `accent_color` (String) Accent color (hex, e.g., #8b5cf6). Used for highlights, badges, and emphasis.
- `announcement` (Attributes) Announcement bar configuration. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--announcement))
- `company_name` (String) Company name.
- `default_theme` (String) Default theme for users. Valid values: light, dark, system.
- `favicon_url` (String) URL to the favicon.
- `logo_url` (String) URL to the company logo.
- `platform_description` (String) Description of the platform.
- `platform_name` (String) Name of the platform displayed in the UI.
- `primary_color` (String) Primary brand color (hex, e.g., #3b82f6). Used for active states and primary buttons.
- `secondary_color` (String) Secondary brand color (hex, e.g., #64748b). Used for hover states and secondary UI elements.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) The creation timestamp.
- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the settings.
- `updated_at` (String) The last update timestamp.

<a id="nestedatt--announcement"></a>
### Nested Schema for `announcement`

Optional:

- `enabled` (Boolean) Whether announcement bar is enabled.
- `link_text` (String) Optional call-to-action link text.
- `link_url` (String) Optional call-to-action link URL.
- `message` (String) Announcement message text.
- `pinned` (Boolean) If true, users cannot dismiss the announcement.
- `type` (String) Announcement type. Valid values: info, warning, error, success.

Read-Only:

- `updated_at` (String) Announcement last update timestamp (used for dismiss tracking).
